messages: My grandmother has told us she has cancer this morning, then her doctor called and said her chest X-Ray was fine
My grandmother has told us she has cancer this morning, then her doctor called and said her chest X-Ray was fine
I'm pretty smooth if I do say so myself. 😂
I'd go outside but I live across from the ghetto and that scares me too.
